pr_title: Fix #138: OpenShift build requires connection to dockerd

timeline.body:
Try to avoid the use of hard-coded path separators and delegate as much as possible to Java.

Following will achieve the same result
```suggestion
            File artifact = new File(project.getBuildDirectory(), artifactFile.getName());
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Try to avoid the use of hard-coded path separators and delegate as much as possible to Java.

Following will achieve the same result

Suggested change
File artifact = new File(project.getBuildDirectory() + File.separator + artifactFile.getName());
File artifact = new File(project.getBuildDirectory(), artifactFile.getName());
